content: I think I'll set a reminder on my phone to remind me to put it away at 10:15 PM every night. I'll also try to find a comfortable spot in my bedroom to read or relax before bed, so I'm not tempted to check my phone or watch TV. Additionally, I might ask a friend or family member to hold me accountable and check in with me every few days to see how I'm doing with my "no screens" rule.
